alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 02 at 3:24PM MST until September 02 at 4:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR AREAS NEAR SKULL VALLEY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Areas near Skull Valley and Kirland in Central Yavapai County. * WHEN...Until 630 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in creeks and normally dry washes is imminent or occurring. Rises in small streams and normally dry washes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 322 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in Skull Valley Wash and Kirkland Creek. Between 0.25 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Skull Valley Wash and Kirkland Creek is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Eastwood Creek, Sycamore Creek, Tonto Wash, Boulder Creek, Copper Basin Wash, Bannon Creek, Willow Creek, Mint Wash, Tank Creek, Skull Valley Wash, Loco Creek, Finch Wash, Strickland Wash, Horse Wash, Kirkland Creek, Alkali Wash, Cottonwood Canyon, Iron Springs Wash, Stinson Wash, Smith Canyon, Burnt Wash, Hassayampa River, Logan Wash, Big Shipp Wash, Spence Creek, Butte Creek, Granite Creek, Board Creek, Miller Creek, Sheppard Wash, Woolsey Wash and Orofino Wash. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.25 to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. Additional heavy rainfall may necessitate a Flash Flood Warning. Stay tuned for updates. - This includes State Route 89 between mile markers 287 and 295...and near mile marker 307...and between mile markers 309 and 311. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life.
